## Available Styles Options

-   borderRadius
-   whiteColorTheme
-   blackColorTheme
-   primaryColorTheme
-   darkGreyColorTheme
-   primaryBgTheme
-   whiteBgTheme
-   cursorPointer
-   borderNone
-   width100
-   height100
-   marginOptions
